website_summaries.verdict: If you want to boost your immune system year round, these will help.
pros: Some buyers say they have yet to catch a cold or flu after taking Zhou Nutrition's gummies
Plus the soft, easily chewed texture tastes candylike

customer_reviews.title: Recall notice
customer_reviews.text: I love these but I feel that I should warn everyone too. These have currently been recalled by the FDA and I was notified by amazon who then refunded my purchase. So you may want to look into that before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. I give my kids 2x/day and upped it to 2x/morning and 2x/night when they tested positive for flu A. One never showed any symptoms and the other had a fever for 1 day and nothing afterwards. I'm definitely a believer in elderberry's immune boosting.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Prevents & Shortens Colds & Viruses♡
customer_reviews.text: These elderberry immune gummies are sweet, chewy and delicious! The active ingredients (Elderberry Extract, Vitamin C, Zinc) are fantastic for the immune system and really help prevent and treat colds and other viral infections. This helped shorten my mom's respiratory cold and helped completely stop mine before it turned into anything real. Elderberry is an incredibly healthy, immune-boosting powerhouse, and this product allows you to experience its benefits in a tasty way!
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but not sure they actually do anything
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious, like candy. We all loved them but I couldn’t give it 5 stars based on the price. With a family of four people taking these, they didn’t last long. And I also can’t say that they helped us to not get sick.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep toddler well
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving these to my 2 year old and dr approved it. I have noticed when everyone is sick she might get a touch but cuts length by great deal. Dr. Said she believes they have helped out quite a bit. Normal cold was lasting a week and she had it for 1day and 1/2 and it was just runny nose than done. I still took her to dr. Doc said the Gummies helped reduce symptoms and length a great deal. Keep giving until flu season is over.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Will be a repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be a repeat customer. I love this combination. It truly works and tastes great. My daughter got a cold from a classmate within 2 days of using this elderberry product she was not congested. And within 4 days her caugh was gone.We all know the caugh lasts THE LONGEST and 4 days is not long at all. So, I will stick to what works. Myself and older daughter began taking it as well at the same time just to be on the safe side and we didn’t come down with ANY symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyEffect

customer_reviews.title: Super Tasty Chews
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting product! I've been looking for something to take now that the weather is colder and this is definitely something I would purchase again. Zhou products are exceptionally reliable and I never have to doubt the quality of the supplements I buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Shea

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of natural products and love the taste of elderberry so this product was a 'win' for me and my family. Some reviews had mentioned the possibility of a recall so I reached out to the company and received a quick, friendly and informative reply that stated "We can 100% assure you that Zhou has had ZERO recalls." Great product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: LA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital so I am always trying anything and everything to boost my immune system. A friend recommended these to me so I figured I’d give them a try. The taste is good and the price is reasonable....their effectiveness however is next to nothing. Even with religious hand washing and wearing a mask around sick patients, I was still hit with the upper respiratory illness along with everyone else. These did absolutely nothing to ease the symptoms or shorten the length. Will most definitely be canceling my auto-order.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle says great tasting, and these really are! They also have a nice texture and are easy to chew unlike other supplement gummies that I have tried. With cold and flu season upon us, I am excited to have some defense that's enjoyable and not loaded with fillers and artificial junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so first of all, these are delicious. Out of all our gummy vitamins, they taste the best. I could easily imagine sitting and eating these like gummy bears. I like them and my kids like them. However, the main reason we got these is because I was tired of everyone always being sick. With the kids in school, it felt like they just took home every cold. I have asthma, so they'd get better after a week, and I'd be sick for months. We started giving our kids these every day, along with gummy vitamin c, and they've worked really well. We're not sick nearly as often, including my child with an immune system disorder. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and works
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was taking these for a few months and then we switched to sambucol (which is easier to find in a drugstore and I saw a sale). She likes the taste of these MUCH more but I think both are helpful. As far as I can tell there is a huge difference in my daughter's reaction to colds around her. She hasnt been sick this year and the past few years it was constant colds pneumonia etc. She and I took them while her dad had a bad cold and neither of us got sick.
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and helps keep me from illness!
customer_reviews.text: Right now so many are ill and I feel like I'm in the midst of it all. I've been taking these supplements over a year and only once back in early December did I get ill, which is very good odds for me! They taste really good - and are chewy rather than that awful gummy plastic taste in many 'gummy' items. I've tried so many different items and I've come back to these because I actually look forward to taking them, as if they're a big of candy I like to chew rather than medicine. Had never had elderberry anything before and now I love that flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Lila4Life

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what my kids were going to think about these, but they love them and are always asking for vitamins now. One of my three kids came down with a cold before I had ordered these, so we got the other two going on the vitamins daily and no one else every caught the cold. We do other natural immune boosting too, but I think these work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: writenow

customer_reviews.title: These are devine gummies.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many elderberry supplements and these have to be by far my favorite. 1st off they taste like a Berry candy that I've never put on my palate but hits home. Almost like a mixture of a BlackBerry with raspberry zest. Very tart and sweet at the same time I cannot explain. Also there is no gummy residue like most companies provide. Do note that they are high in sugar only because most of immunity medication is high sugar. This do the job and don't leave any residue in my mouth. They also don't trigger any ibs or bloating which moat meds leave me with .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and kept my  from getting sick even when I wan my Flu ridden friends
customer_reviews.text: I have a compromised immune system which caused me to get sick at least once every flu & cold seasons...Until I started taking these delicious Elder-Mune Elderberry gummies!!! Honestly, I didn’t realize what it was at first but did my research & found they REALLY WORK!! I’d much rather use something naturally as a preventative instead of getting extreme instead of using chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: SummerLove 247

customer_reviews.title: Yummy flavor
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are as described. They are yummy and easy to make part of your morning routine. Our family was battling winter illnesses so we started taking these gummies to boost our immune system. Currently feeling great!! I think they really helped!!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Riebeling

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: These are not effective. Also, please check for recall. We are returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Suson 🌼🍃

customer_reviews.title: If only all medicine tasted so good!
customer_reviews.text: Was struggling through covid at home and heard about elderberry gummies. This was the first brand I tried. I'd been sick for months before, no sign of getting better. 2 days after starting these I felt noticeable improvement. 2 weeks in I was sleeping through the night. My husband showed first signs so we started him on them right away. He was well in 3 weeks. Not a total cure I'm sure, I'm convinced they helped a lot! Tried another brand when I couldn't find these again. They were so sugary/sour/awful we threw them out. Now we try to keep these in stock. Highly recommend!! As my sister put it, "If only all medicine tasted so good!"
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lorentzen

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: did not do anything. total rip off don't waste your money.better off taking vitamin c tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Rehan

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these while traveling and working in a large hospital and so far, no sickness! I've had 2- 6 hour flights and long clinical days working with sick patients. I know I've been stressed out and exposed to many illnesses, but have been taking these gummies 2 x day along with drinking lots of water and sleeping 7+ hours at night. They taste sweet, like a fruit snack. I think they're a good tool to use with healthy habits like handwashing, sleep, and fluids to keep your immune system healthy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lusco

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and
customer_reviews.text: The flavor and texture of the dummies are the best! It makes it a joy to take. So far I have not caught any cold or flu from loved ones I have been around who have colds or the flu. I highly recommend these Elder-Muse . Sambucus Elderberry Gummies. I buy and have them sent to my daughter and her family in another stateand also for one of my sons in another state.. I will continue taking them through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Moquin Pinkert

customer_reviews.title: My must have daily chewable!!
customer_reviews.text: My family started taking elderberry supplements last fall and noticed a big improvement in our body's ability to stay virus resistant! My high school age son was one of the few kids who didn't catch the flu as it made rounds TWICE thru his school, thank God....these taste great, easy to chew - not hardened gel at all, and an awesome price! Love 'em and will continue to take no matter the season 😊
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!! However ingredients were disappointing; Vit C and zinc is minimal; elderberry who knows?
customer_reviews.text: I think the claim is over the top and does not deliver the quality promised. Although delicious to the taste, it has mostly sweeteners and a little over 100 mg of Vit. C...when 1,000 mg is what is needed a day to fight a serious virus....zinc is minimal also lots of sweeteners are all the first items mentioned...disappointing....yummy to the taste and great for small children probably to get some C and zinc into them but I took 8 of them to feel I was giving myself something of value. Very delicious I must say ...taste is a 10......benefit....a 4 .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lansing Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with my immune system. It seems to be doing the trick! Great flavor! Just be mindful you might need to stay close to the restroom until your body can adjust! Elderberry seems to promote BM great if you suffer from constipation! Not so much so if you don’t! Only takes a day or 2 to adjust! Or you can take one in the morning and one in the evening!!
customer_reviews.author: Alica James

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of this product I have used many products that were way better than this and a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My whole family LOVES these gummies! They are absolutely delicious, and I really do think they help shorten the life of the common cold at least. Kids are exposed to SO many germs at school, we need all the help we can get!! We take 2 a day during these winter months, myself included. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: WNYGirl

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Easy Delivery of Elderberry
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to get elderberry in during flu season. Some liquids can be thick and syrupy, so popping these in a lunchbox is a great convenience. This season, with all children vaccinated and adults not, no one suffered more than two days, tops. I pair this with zinc and antiviral herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Losribeiros

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand prior and compared it to this brand. For the price and milligram of elderberry, this was the best value. This brand was also less tart than the other brand I bought. I will continue to buy if the price and mg remains fairly close.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Just too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: The brand I had been buying was no longer available so I went with these based on reviews. They are very, very sweet. If that doesn’t bother you, then go for it. If you don’t like super sweet, try another brand. They are not too chewy like some other gummies. You are supposed to thoroughly chew gummy vitamins and some are almost impossible. These almost melt in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal broken
customer_reviews.text: Very sad that my bottle was not secure. When i opened the safety seal was broken. I won't be taking them. I don't know how to rate this order. I have used the product before and was very pleased. I am at a loss with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: BEST GUMMIES EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have tried ALOT of gummy vitamins and these are by FAR the yummiest, best tasting ones out there! Seriously SO GOOD. I may be addicted. As for the results, I am not sure but I will continue taking them because if their benefits are half as good as the taste then they are worth it
customer_reviews.author: nathan t.

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used many elderberry products and this one tastes great. When I take it regularly, I rarely get sick. And with today's landscape, it is important to do everything you can to boost your immune system. What I like about this product: 1. Easy to chew 2. Contains zinc along with the elderberry 3. Breaks down fast 4. I actually feel better the days I take it
customer_reviews.author: D. E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tasty
customer_reviews.text: These things are pretty delicious. I took these while everyone at work was getting sick. I believe the combo of these gummies, staying hydrated, and adequate sleep kept me from catching the dreaded office cold.
customer_reviews.author: kittkat

customer_reviews.title: Good price, taste and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking elderberry gummies for a few months now and I believe it made a difference in me not getting a cold or cough. Will see how it goes long term but for now I take these everyday. Whenever I feel tingling in my throat, I take an extra dose. I switched to this brand and this is my second bottle and so far I like it. Taste is better than others I have tried and these are vegan, so even better.
customer_reviews.author: Minky

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for the zinc to project my respiratory system against Covid. So far it seems to be working just fine who knows but it’s extremely yummy and I just suck on them slowly in fact sometimes I’ll take it out put it on the little dish and second later as it’s best to string that out. It also has vitamin C and elderberry than it so it’s really good for you
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 6 year old daughter to help her from getting sick while in school. Giving her 2 gummy’s a day it only lasts for a month and she still ended up with a cold during that time. So I’m not sure how well it helped. For the price I couldn’t justify continuing to buy more. She did like the flavor and had no problems chewing or swallowing the gummy’s.
customer_reviews.author: JandD

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and practical.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! Excellent flavor, and both my son and myself love them!! They also had a slightly higher amount of elderberry than the other gummies I looked at on Amazon, and I like that there's a sufficient amount of zinc, but not too much in case we want to use zinc from other sources as well. (Zinc lozenges are supposed to help kill viruses in your throat just after exposure, so I wanted to be sure we could still use those as needed too.) Excellent value for the price and they're really good!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great-tasting immunity booter
customer_reviews.text: I took these (and echinacea) during the first COVID "lockdown" while also following distancing and mask rules, and managed to not catch even a cold. I seemed to feel better with fewer allergy issues, too. These gummies taste really good - made me look forward to my daily dose! I will definitely add these to my winter "avoid colds and flu" supplements!
customer_reviews.author: Melody L

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, makes taking this vitamin something to look forward to.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves these elderberry supplements. It may be too soon to tell if they actually boost the immune system, but all I've read online has praised elderberry as one way to fight off this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands and these easily tasted the worst. I usually love the flavor, but these were more bitter, grainy, and tough. Plus, they were more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Taste great and awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: These are great in taste and have helped fight off the nasty winter colds all my friends had.
customer_reviews.author: Domrockstar

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: We've only been taking these for little over a week and a half. So the jury is still out on whether or not they work. But on the upside they have a great taste and it's not hard to get the kids to take them. I'm hoping this will help keep us all healthy. I will try to update in another two or three weeks to give it time to work.
customer_reviews.author: Family of dorks

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great plus Higher Strength
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and has 25% more actual elderberry than the others. I started my family on these for the first time this year (since last Fall began). The difference is dramatic. I caught cold last November and it was gone in 3 days, was quite mild, and with no lingering problems afterwards. Plus no one else came down with it! Remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Merriannes Essencial Oils

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff I have cancer it really helps my immune system
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Collins Cates

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry works
customer_reviews.text: I swear by elderberry for our immune systems. We have taken this product and elderberry for more than 6 months and haven't seem to get as much crud as we typically do, especially during the winter with a child in daycare. If you like the gummy form of things, I recommend this product. Otherwise, you might want a stronger capsule form.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh.C

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, no nause
customer_reviews.text: These taste amazing. I needed to add zinc to my diet and traditional zinc supplements make me nauseous. These do not at all. They helped me kick a virus quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nebel

customer_reviews.title: Soft, beautiful color & smells amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and smells amazing. Honestly it's easier to get these for kids who too hard headed to swallow a vitamins but I got this for a buddy who just had his teeth fixed and couldn't swallow good so he loved it cause it gave him a chance to taste and softly chew. I'm gonna order more soon. HELPFUL PLS :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Super Value & Great Immune Support
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this brand. Have always used a more popular brand. Decided to try these due to the extremely good value. I take Elderberry gummies to prevent catching all of the yucky viruses that go around. So far so good! I have been in contact at home and traveling with people that have had summertime colds and “knock on wood” these Elderberry Gummies, seem to provide the same immune support as the other brand I was previously using.
customer_reviews.author: lesli

customer_reviews.title: Love these !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several of these & would say this is the best one. Great flavor, soft & easy to chew. These have 125mg elderberry unlike the others that have only 100mg.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A Delmore

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fighting cancer.... use during cold and flu season or when in Dr office/hospital
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: Great at preventing colds!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought elderberry gummies on the recommendation of a friend since my school age child kept bringing home a cold to my 4 year old. We have been using these gummies for about a month and since we have began them the kids haven’t had a cold. No sniffles. No cough. I can’t believe it was as simple as giving them one gummy a day. I was buying two 4 oz bottles of cough medicine a week and now no need. So happy I found these. Best purchase I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these. They taste great really. Easy to chew. But I've been sick twice since taking. I haven't been sick in 3 years - until Christmas 2019. And I got a cold again end of January. cant say they helped shorten my cold at all either. I'll stick with my drops
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting gummy‘s ever !
customer_reviews.text: I am on my fifth bottle of this stuff ! Having two kids who are constantly sick I have managed to escape everyone . Now all three of us take this and have a hard time sharing ! It taste so good AND it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: imaginarydork

customer_reviews.title: They work for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are delicious. So far so good. Everyone around me is sick and I am not. Very unusual. I usually get everything from everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, Just in time!
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good and they're working. The day after I started using them I woke up with signs of an upper respiratory infection. I cleared my head with saline drops and took two of these. My headache went away and my sinuses cleared up. I'm sure they helped.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Will Purchase Again :)
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if they are keeping me from catching anything, but they have the most elderberry of any gummy I've found. The taste is slightly different from another brand, but still really yummy and easy to get used to. I'd recommend if you don't like to taste of elderberry liquid.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lamberjack

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and for immunity
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves this product! He's been healthy ever since we started giving it to him! I would recommend to anyone who needs an immune boost!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa S Baez

customer_reviews.title: More palatable than others
customer_reviews.text: We had good results with another elderberry supplement at this price point, but my family didnt like the tartness. This brand is much more pleasant to taste and appeals to my child. This brand also has a higher concentration of elderberry extract so I would recommend it over others.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good. What more do you need? As far as I can tell, they have worked as an immune system booster and shortens the life/severity of a cold I recently came down with.
customer_reviews.author: Xmich

customer_reviews.title: Immune system support that actually WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this item, it has really made a difference for my family this cold/flu season! Worth its weight in gold! (And they taste fantastic.)
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, Sure
customer_reviews.text: Product was good. Price was good (as long as they stay consistent for repurchases and don't raise the prices). Flavor a bit on the tart side. But overall they were good.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Taste REALLY Good
customer_reviews.text: I could eat these like candy. I can't speak much for the health benefits... they're gone too fast for me to tell! Lol. If you know about the ingredients though and you're thinking of buying these, go for it. They are really tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: You will be surprised.
customer_reviews.text: A must have product. I usually don’t believe in the homeopathic stuff but they thing are amazing after taking them for several months I have not been sick. I usually stay sick this time of year But not this year
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Fine product, not too sweet...
customer_reviews.text: These gummies seem to work okay. I like that they're not super-sugary sweet...
customer_reviews.author: Douglass Dumbrille

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my 3 bottle...
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to swallow just chew them up...I work in the medical field and i do feel a difference with my immune system and energy when I don't take them or change up on vitamins! Just try a bottle and feel the difference
customer_reviews.author: a bowman

customer_reviews.title: Quality You Must Count On
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. However, the actual gummie count is consistently lower than 60. Not right.
customer_reviews.author: KrissyMac

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves these
customer_reviews.text: These are the best immunity gummies I have found. Compared to many other brands I tried, these have more mg of elderberry per serving, have no artificial colors or flavors, and use coconut oil rather than palm oil. The whole family loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: You get a good amount and deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this has 75 more mg than the competitors do. My niece told me to buy these elderberry gummies but a different brand. I think she might switch to these because hers have only 50mg and these are a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela

customer_reviews.title: Health is everything!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They taste so great that my mother-in-law is now hooked. The best thing that has come from taking them is good health. I work in an elementary school and have not been sick since we started taking them. The flu hit my school hard, but it didn't bother me. I credit Elder-Mune.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Fluharty

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking 2 of these daily to help my immune system. I hope they work and I will order more. They sure taste good. I’d like to eat more than the suggested amount, but won’t. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mary526

customer_reviews.title: I Never have to remind my Family to take their Vitamins anymore!
customer_reviews.text: My 7y/o son loves the Elder-Mune Gummy Vitamins so much that he asks for them every morning, he’s never asked to take his vitamins before until now. My husband also loves them which means I don’t have to remind either of them to take their vitamins anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Toler

customer_reviews.title: Hoping they work
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving a 4-star because my son just started them. He got a cold/flu this year already and passed it to me, so I decided to see if these can keep his immunity up while in school. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Mountaineerfan

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, husband loves them too 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. The flavor is great..almost too great haha. Elderberry is so good for your immune system! Lots of antioxidants so I stocked up on these gummies before Covid really hit 👍
customer_reviews.author: Becky Chiocca

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: These are good, bit they hurt my stomach. I don't know why.
customer_reviews.author: pwhitechurch

customer_reviews.title: Really like these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these elderberry gummys. Taste great. Love that they support immune health. Size is fine. Chew-able is great. Found it a good value for the price and would definitely recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: baby momma knows

customer_reviews.title: Best immune boosting product I've come across
customer_reviews.text: When I feel a cold coming or just want to boost my immune system, I am always looking for zinc, vitamin-C, elderberry and echninea. This product has the first three on my wish list. Thanks for making such an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Amjad Aman

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: I am a NP and give these to my grandchildren them keep them healthy during winter months. Zinc is anti-viral and these gummies are easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: carol salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Use! I beg people all the time to use this so I don't have to.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Tastes great. Works great. At the 1st you know your coming down with a cold take. Better than zicam. I am a firm believer in zinc am but elderberry works faster and tastier than zicam.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Family approved.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love these. They taste good and I feel as though you get your money's worth with the amount and quality of them. I have no trouble gettt my children to take them with their daily vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Mickaela McCreery

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but so yummy
customer_reviews.text: These taste great but were a but pricey for us, do we discontinued use. There are too many other products with the same effect for less. My kids wanted to keep taking them because they were the best gummy we ever tasted b
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!!
customer_reviews.text: GET SOME. I get sick every year faithfully by the holiday season. I'm a retail worker who has been around 3 flu ridden coworkers, 2 family members, plus many open-mouthed coughing customers (Idk who raises these people).. And I've been golden! When my family was sick, I started to feel a tad feverish with a headache but I went to bed and woke up feeling great, no more symptoms. First year ever for this so yeah, gotta be these. Oh and they taste amazing. Do yourself a favor.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Adults and kids love. Recommended from a children’s hospital doctor.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Chewy--Not Sure How Much These Help Me, Though
customer_reviews.text: Take it every day. Super tasty! Not sure how well it helps my body, but hopefully it does. Chewy, tasty, and way better than the gummie daily multi-vitamins I also take. Am on my 3rd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: nitroburn1972

customer_reviews.title: Nice Immune Boost
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my niece who is a nurse. She takes it everyday to keep her immunity in check. I have been taking it for over a month and feel pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: globug

customer_reviews.title: Great gummy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, just need 2 per day! They are soft unlike some gummies that can be hard. I tried to reorder but they were unavailable. Hope they get them back in stock and I can reorder before I’m out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: A must for households with kids!
customer_reviews.text: As a family, we take these gummies every single day. We have escaped many of the colds and flu that have been hitting the neighborhood. I’m a firm believer in elderberry and have recommended this product to many of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to avoid colds and such this is the way to go. It really works and for that I'm grateful. Have not found anything that works this good or this fast. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jeneane zant

customer_reviews.title: Ausome company and ausome products
customer_reviews.text: Ok I ordered this and they were out of stock so they sent me a different kind but the very cool part is when they got stuck back in they sent me this product and it is ausome and tastes great it's working great too
customer_reviews.author: Dianne beall

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was more than just a month supply for the cost
customer_reviews.text: They have a very strong distinct flavor I’m not sure if I like but at least I can swallow quickly! Not sure they help at all, have been taking them and have been sick the same amount.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Kulzer

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic ready
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious.. Too bad it's not candy. Will buy them again. They work really well, especially during a pandemic where you need to keep your immune system great!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get sick when those around me all were
customer_reviews.text: These taste fantastic and the gummy texture is perfect! I’ve used them faithfully when those around me were sick and I didn’t catch the virus! You have a customer in me.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We take almost daily during cold and flu season and and extra of we feel a cold coming on. Seems to help lessen symptoms or duration of a cold.
customer_reviews.author: Serial Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t run out!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these! I wasn’t sure if they actually did anything to boost immunity until we ran out. Within the week we all had some kind of gunk. Re ordered and have been taking them religiously. We might get the sniffles but it’s so minor no one bats an eye.
customer_reviews.author: michon long

customer_reviews.title: Our Choice for Elderberry Gummies
customer_reviews.text: These have more elderberry than most other gummies, and they have a good flavor. We’ve tried a lot of elderberry gummies, and these work the best.
customer_reviews.author: KSinKansas

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Hopefully they are keeping my resistance to the Chinese Flu at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bordner

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be effective
customer_reviews.text: Chewable and tas easy to digest. Seems to do the trick. 2 a day. My husband only takes them when he feels something coming on. Seems to work that way too.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth zelinger

customer_reviews.title: Boost up your immunity in a easy tasty way
customer_reviews.text: It's chewable and taste just like candy. I've been using it regularly to boost my immune system and i refuse to get a flu shot. I have not got sick and I've given them out as gifts. Good Health To You!!
customer_reviews.author: Jalina Jay Cortes

customer_reviews.title: the zinc content and taste
customer_reviews.text: I have had other products with the same vitamin content , they cost more than double and tasted like old gym socks. This is a great bargine and the kids love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Steven T

customer_reviews.title: Love These. They taste great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. They taste great and have exactly what i was looking for in them. Unfortunately they are no longer available otherwise i would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

product_meta.title: Zhou Nutrition Elder-Mune Sambucus Elderberry Gummies - Antioxidant Flavonoids, Immune Support Gummy Vitamins, Zinc Supplement & Vitamin C Supplement
product_meta.description: Fuel your immunity and power through any season with Elder-Mune, delicious elderberry gummies that deliver a powerhouse combination of elderberry, vitamin C, and zinc. Sambucus elderberry has been used for centuries for it’s immune-supporting antioxidant flavonoids that stop free radicals in their tracks. Elder-Mune offers one of the highest potencies of elderberry on the market at 125mg per serving, with a delicious natural berry flavor that kids and grown-ups love. It’s your 3-in-1 immunity booster for the entire family.
feature_bullets: 3-IN-1 IMMUNE BOOST. Elder-Mune combines sambucus elderberry, a potent antioxidant extract that helps support immune system health, with immunity boosters vitamin C and zinc to create your go-to, 3-in-1 immunity boosting elderberry gummies

ANTIOXIDANT POWERHOUSE. Antioxidants are your wellness BFFs, working to fight off free radicals and keep your body healthy, balanced, and functioning properly. Elderberry is world famous for its antioxidant power, supporting your immune system year-round

MAX STRENGTH ELDERBERRY POWER. Elder-Mune gummies give you what other elderberry gummies can’t—one of the highest potencies of lab-tested sambucus elderberry extract on the market, with 125mg per serving and a natural flavor that tastes great

IMMUNE SUPPORT FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY. Your whole crew will love taking Elder-Mune. With critical immune boosters elderberry, vitamin C, and zinc, a delicious flavor, and powerful immune support for kids, your entire family will keep coming back for more

WHAT SETS US APART? At Zhou, we use only the highest-quality ingredients in a facility following GMP (good manufacturing practices). Plus, we test everything at our lab in Utah, so you can be confident that you’re fueling your body with the very best
